cu.edu.cujae.ceis.tree.binary

Class BinaryTree<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • cu.edu.cujae.ceis.tree.Tree<E>
      • cu.edu.cujae.ceis.tree.binary.BinaryTree<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the type of elements stored in the tree
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LexicographicTree

    public class BinaryTree<E>
extends Tree<E>
implements java.io.Serializable
    Implementation of a binary tree data structure. Provides operations for binary tree manipulation and traversal.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • insertNode

        public boolean insertNode(BinaryTreeNode<E> node,
                          char type,
                          BinaryTreeNode<E> father)
        Inserts a node into the tree at the specified position relative to a parent node.
        Parameters:
        node - the node to insert
        type - 'L' for left child, 'R' for right child, 'R' for root if father is null
        father - the parent node, or null for root insertion
        Returns:
        true if insertion was successful, false otherwise
